reviewText: My son loves all the songs for each of the Sacraments. It's such a great, informative way to explain the Sacraments. Love all the Brother Francis movies!
Great video for kids! Gave it to a friend who has 3 children.
My students love these dvd s in kindergarten
Great material to work with kids
Everything Brother Francis is awesome!  I am very Happy with this video.  Truly love it and so do the children in my Sunday School class.

I think I have the whole set now.
Great teaching tool.
Brother Francis is engaging and the kids "get it:!
Brother Francis videos are the best.
